com.eemi.ext4j.client.grid.feature

Class Grouping

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eemi.ext4j.client.core.JsObject
      • com.eemi.ext4j.client.core.config.BaseConfig
        • com.eemi.ext4j.client.grid.feature.Feature
          • com.eemi.ext4j.client.grid.feature.Grouping
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GroupingSummary

    public class Grouping
extends Feature
    This feature allows to display the grid rows aggregated into groups as specified by the groupers specified on the Store. The group will show the title for the group name and then the appropriate records for the group underneath. The groups can also be expanded and collapsed.
